normalised: Arrey yaar, the cutoff for D-U's B-Com Hons last year was like, ninety eight point seven five percent! I swear, my grandma scored higher than that on her chappal throwing skills during Diwali. Now, C-U-E-T scores are the in thing for admissions. Wonder if my percentile will be enough to get into Hindu College, fingers crossed! Else, I'm joining my papa's kirana store. At least I'll get a degree in retail management, haan? wink
